DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to assess if rTMS on healthy hemisphere at one hertz could improve patients with post stroke dysphagia.
DOC.brief_title: Repetitive Transcranial Stimulation (rTMS) in Post Stroke Dysphagia
DOC.criteria: dysphagia first episode of stroke swallowing disorder before stroke previous episode of stroke MMS < 20 no consent
